20110129050701.000|20110129050703.000|CC1|>> Reporter: RON JABALEE SR.

20110129053234.000|20110129053236.000|CC1|ROOM, THE HOME WAS EERILY       
20110129053236.000|20110129053237.000|CC1|COMPOSED, AS THOUGH HIS MOM AND 
20110129053237.000|20110129053238.000|CC1|DAD HAD JUST STEPPED OUT FOR A  
20110129053238.000|20110129053240.000|CC1|MOMENT.

20110129053242.000|20110129053242.000|CC1|WERE.

20110129053249.000|20110129053250.000|CC1|HAD COAXED INTO BEING.          
20110129053250.000|20110129053252.000|CC1|AND IN THE LIVING ROOM, HIS     
20110129053252.000|20110129053253.000|CC1|MOM'S FAVORITE COUCH AND HER    
20110129053253.000|20110129053254.000|CC1|SNACK.                          
20110129053254.000|20110129053256.000|CC1|>> I SAW A DIET COKE BEING DRANK

20110129053258.000|20110129053300.000|CC1|THE HOUSE I LIVED IN, I COULDN'T

20110129053302.000|20110129053303.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THEN HE WENT

20110129053313.000|20110129053315.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN CYNICAL POLICE  
20110129053315.000|20110129053317.000|CC1|WISDOM, IT SAYS IF THE MURDER   
20110129053317.000|20110129053318.000|CC1|CASE ISN'T SOLVED IN THE FIRST  
20110129053318.000|20110129053320.000|CC1|48 HOURS, IT IS GOING TO TAKE A 
20110129053320.000|20110129053320.000|CC1|WHILE.                          
20110129053320.000|20110129053321.000|CC1|THAT'S WHAT HAPPENED WITH THIS  
20110129053321.000|20110129053322.000|CC1|INVESTIGATION.                  
20110129053322.000|20110129053323.000|CC1|THE DETECTIVES BEGAN THE TEDIOUS
20110129053323.000|20110129053324.000|CC1|WORK OF TALKING TO THE PEOPLE

20110129053335.000|20110129053337.000|CC1|LINK TO RON SR.'S SALES WORK IN

20110129053348.000|20110129053350.000|CC1|>> WE LOOKED INTO ALL THOSE

20110129054136.000|20110129054139.000|CC1|>>> RON AND CHRIS KEEN JABALEE  
20110129054139.000|20110129054139.000|CC1|HAD BEEN MURDERED IN OCTOBER,   
20110129054139.000|20110129054141.000|CC1|THE HOLIDAYS BROUGHT THEIR OWN  
20110129054141.000|20110129054207.000|CC1|SPECIAL PANG.                   
20110129054207.000|20110129054209.000|CC1|IN EARLY 2007, THE THREE JABALEE
20110129054209.000|20110129054211.000|CC1|CHILDREN AGREED TO AN INTERVIEW 
20110129054211.000|20110129054213.000|CC1|WITH NBC'S DETROIT AFFILIATE,   
20110129054213.000|20110129054215.000|CC1|BUT WOULDN'T LET THEIR FACES BE 
20110129054215.000|20110129054215.000|CC1|SHOWN.                          
20110129054215.000|20110129054216.000|CC1|THEY WERE FEARFUL OF THE KILLER 
20110129054216.000|20110129054218.000|CC1|OR KILLERS STILL ON THE LOOSE.  
20110129054218.000|20110129054222.000|CC1|THEY WERE ALL DESPERATE FOR     
20110129054222.000|20110129054222.000|CC1|ANSWERS.                        
20110129054222.000|20110129054223.000|CC1|>> RYAN.                        
20110129054223.000|20110129054224.000|CC1|>> WE WANT TO KNOW WHAT HAPPENED
20110129054224.000|20110129054225.000|CC1|TO OUR PARENTS.                 
20110129054225.000|20110129054227.000|CC1|THEY SHOULDN'T HAVE PASSED LIKE 
20110129054227.000|20110129054228.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20110129054228.000|20110129054228.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HIS BROTHER RON.   
20110129054228.000|20110129054229.000|CC1|>> EVERY DAY, EVERY MINUTE IT IS
20110129054229.000|20110129054230.000|CC1|IN OUR MINDS.                   
20110129054230.000|20110129054232.000|CC1|IT WON'T GO AWAY UNTIL THEY FIND
20110129054232.000|20110129054232.000|CC1|SOMEBODY.                       
20110129054232.000|20110129054233.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POLICE BELIEVE FROM
20110129054233.000|20110129054234.000|CC1|THE BEGINNING THAT THE INTENSITY
20110129054234.000|20110129054237.000|CC1|OF THE SLAUGHTER SUGGESTED A    
20110129054237.000|20110129054239.000|CC1|CLOSE CONNECTION BETWEEN KILLER 
20110129054239.000|20110129054239.000|CC1|AND VICTIM.

20110129054243.000|20110129054244.000|CC1|PROFESSIONAL GRUDGE, RYAN WASN'T
20110129054244.000|20110129054245.000|CC1|TAKING ANY CHANCES.             
20110129054245.000|20110129054247.000|CC1|>> I HAD SECURITY CAMERAS PUT ON
20110129054247.000|20110129054250.000|CC1|THE OUTSIDE OF MY HOME, BOUGHT A
20110129054250.000|20110129054253.000|CC1|PISTOL, CARRIED IT ON ME.       
20110129054253.000|20110129054255.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU DIDN'T KNOW IF 
20110129054255.000|20110129054256.000|CC1|IT WAS A VENDETTA.              
20110129054256.000|20110129054259.000|CC1|>> I DIDN'T KNOW.               
20110129054259.000|20110129054300.000|CC1|>> Reporter: POLICE HAD CLEARED 
20110129054300.000|20110129054303.000|CC1|EVERY CLOSE RELATIVE ON THEIR   
20110129054303.000|20110129054303.000|CC1|LIST.

20110129054306.000|20110129054308.000|CC1|RON JABALEE JR.

20110129054309.000|20110129054312.000|CC1|BECAUSE DETECTIVE STEPHENS

20110129054432.000|20110129054435.000|CC1|CHECK OUT HIS CONSTRUCTION SITE?

20110129054804.000|20110129054808.000|CC1|WHEN YOUR MOTHER AND FATHER ARE 
20110129054808.000|20110129054808.000|CC1|MURDERED?                       
20110129054808.000|20110129054809.000|CC1|TRAGEDIES HAPPEN.               
20110129054809.000|20110129054811.000|CC1|CAR ACCIDENTS, PLANES FALL OUT  
20110129054811.000|20110129054813.000|CC1|OF THE SKY, BUT THIS?           
20110129054813.000|20110129054814.000|CC1|>> Reporter: RON JR. TOLD THE   
20110129054814.000|20110129054815.000|CC1|DETECTIVE WE ARE WAS THE FRIDAY 
20110129054815.000|20110129054818.000|CC1|NIGHT HIS PARENTS WERE MURDERED.
20110129054818.000|20110129054820.000|CC1|>> WENT TO MY VACANT HOME, WENT 
20110129054820.000|20110129054823.000|CC1|TO MY HOUSE, CHANGED MY CLOTHES,
20110129054823.000|20110129054825.000|CC1|ATE, WENT UPSTAIRS, PUT A MOVIE 
20110129054825.000|20110129054825.000|CC1|IN, FELL ASLEEP.                
20110129054825.000|20110129054827.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT THE DETECTIVE  
20110129054827.000|20110129054829.000|CC1|CHALLENGED THAT STORY AND BATTLE
